thread.section_title: Soho Grand Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location Location
thread.title_full: Location Location - Review of Soho Grand Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Harrison W
title: Location Location
text: I really like this hotel right in the heart of Soho. My family and I have been staying in this hotel for many years and they never disappoint. The location is really the highlight of this property. Located just steps from great restaurants, bars, and shopping. The rooms are quaint and clean. The hotel has a very laid back hipster vibe. I highly recommend this hotel if you want to be in this part of Manhattan.
